title: ‘Hey Cortana' listening feature now available for Android
text:
‘Hey Cortana' listening feature now available for Android 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
The addition of active listening to Cortana continues Microsoft's ambitions on Android, though the beta's new feature suffers from inconsist... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
